Title: Sticks and Bones
Description:
While the krolusks like to attack from beneath, the Rumbling Waste also plays host to a predator who prefers to swoop down from above. Deepsflayers have built nests on the peaks and ridges around the Waste. 

Destroy their nests and show them that the Waste is no welcoming home.
CompletionText: Let's show those overgrown bats that the Wastes is no home for them!
RewardText: I could see the smoke from here! Good job! That ought to make those wretched things look for a new place to perch.
